info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Otero County through 300 PM MDT... At 233 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Bent. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bent and Burro Flats. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
